name: Bolt.js
tagline: A Node.js-base app runtime environment written in JavaScript
body:
### Welcome to Bolt.js
Bolt.js is a Node.js-based app runtime environment written in JavaScript.

With Bolt.js you get to run your JavaScript web apps and websites in an environment that feels like an operating system.

Get up to speed on the whole Bolt thingy on the official [Bolt.js book](https://chieze-franklin.gitbooks.io/bolt-js/content/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
